text: Asplenium schweinfurthii is a species of fern in the family Aspleniaceae. It is endemic to Yemen. Its natural habitats are subtropical or tropical dry forests and subtropical or tropical dry shrubland. It is threatened by habitat loss. ==References== schweinfurthii Category:Endemic flora of Socotra Category:Ferns of Asia Category:Vulnerable flora of Asia Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot Category:Taxa named by John Gilbert Baker
title: Asplenium schweinfurthii
